name: Stream Draws
description:
Stream Draws With Twitch is a game that lets your stream chat draw amazing (pixel) art while you stream. You simply run it on your own computer, point it at your stream's chat and it'll do the rest. It will react to commands in the chat, reply to questions and be entertaining for you and your viewers.

And when you're done? Simply save the created masterpiece and let everyone have it. Or put it on shirts and mugs. Or create a game around it. Or make it your new Stream logo. Or think of something even more amazing!

Ideal for art streamers or just chatting! Stream Draws is the best way to play with your community live on stream and create amazing art in a relaxed way.

Features:

Over 25600 known color names, containing all your favorite colors like:
magenta, beige, burningtomato, 20000Leaguesunderthesea and fleischfarben

  • Draw pixel by pixel
  • Draw with lines
  • Configurable size
  • Optional Preview/Reference Picture
  • On screen achievements for drawing players
  • Automatic color code detection from reference picture
  • Manual color codes selectable
  • Changeable background (solid color or custom image)
  • Optional support to receive commands via DM
  • Save drawings as screenshot and pixel PNG
  • Session replay mode
  • DRM free

Stream Draws runs on YOUR machine, you own your copy and as long as the Twitch chat works it will work without depending on any other external services.

What do streamers say?

This game gets a 10/10 and the  "van Hain'sche seal of approval"

- Moevi van Hain

There is MORE:

We have a BIG feature list planned but since YOU and your community is playing, we like to know what you would like to see as a upcoming feature to make your experience even more colorful.

As soon as we get enough resonance, we will also release on steam and everyone who bought Stream Draws will get a free steam key too.
